about_the_game:
Experience the fast-paced roguelite skyline crawler from a completely different perspective! With the Tilt Five™ Holographic Gaming System you can dive into the action in a new and exciting way. Let the skyscrapers grow out of your Gameboard and enjoy the thrill of fighting in the middle of your living room.

Attention! To use this DLC you will need the Tilt Five™ Holographic Gaming System (Tilt Five™ Glasses, Tilt Five™ Wand, and the Tilt Five™ Gameboard).

About Tilt Five:

Level up your game night with tabletop holograms. The Tilt Five™ Holographic Gaming System transforms tabletop and video games into 3D vibrant holographic environments. Using the Tilt Five™ augmented reality (AR) Glasses, Gameboard, and Wand controller, you can immerse yourself--and your friends--in experiences like never before. Discover how Tilt Five can bring Danger Scavenger to life on your tabletop!

How it Works:
It’s super simple! Open the Tilt Five™ Gameboard on any table and connect the Tilt Five™ Glasses to your PC (Windows 10 or later). Put on the Glasses and use your Tilt Five™ Wand (or a regular controller). Start Danger Scavenger on Steam and get ready for the battle with vicious AI!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating syste
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 or Intel Core i3 (3 Ghz)
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 7970 or NVIDIA GeForce 770 or equivalent DirectX 11 card
  • Additional Notes: You need Tilt Five™ glasses, Tilt Five™ wand, Tilt Five™ gameboard
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating syste
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 or Intel Core i5 (3 Ghz)
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 480 or NVIDIA GeForce 1060 or equivalent DirectX 11 card
  • Additional Notes: You need Tilt Five™ glasses, Tilt Five™ wand, Tilt Five™ gameboard

Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Additional Notes: You need Tilt Five™ glasses, Tilt Five™ wand, Tilt Five™ gameboard
mac_requirements.recommended:

name: Danger Scavenger AR - Tilt Five Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 or Intel Core i3 (3 Ghz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 7970 or NVIDIA GeForce 770 or equivalent DirectX 11 card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You need Tilt Five™ glasses, Tilt Five™ wand, Tilt Five™ gameboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 or Intel Core i5 (3 Ghz)
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 480 or NVIDIA GeForce 1060 or equivalent DirectX 11 card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You need Tilt Five™ glasses, Tilt Five™ wand, Tilt Five™ gameboard

short_description: Danger Scavenger is fast-paced action, cyberpunk-themed, roguelite skyline crawler. Blow up, cut, shoot enemy robots on the roofs of skyscrapers. Choose your way to higher levels, loot, buy stuff, upgrade yourself, fight against greedy corporations, be a rebel!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Polish
